description: Try this delicious spinach and ricotta pasta bake with a cheesy top. Honeycomb pasta is an easy one-pot recipe perfect for a tasty and satisfying dinner.
name: Spinach & Ricotta Honeycomb Pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour pasta sauce and 2 cups water into a 24cm (10cm deep) cast iron saucepan. Stir to combine. Stand cannelloni upright in pan. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes or until pasta starts to soften. Sprinkle with remaining shredded cheese, then bake, uncovered, for 20 minutes or until cheese has melted and top is crunchy. Serve topped with reserved baby spinach.
